A different_bounding_box is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if bounding boxes of two shape entities are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be either etns_manifold_solid_brep, etns_shell_based_surface_model, or etns_shell_based_wireframe_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of two bounding boxes.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_two_cartesian_points. The detected differences according to this criterion are minimum and maximum points of a bounding box calculated.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A different_centroid is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if distance between the two centroids are larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be either etns_manifold_solid_brep, etns_shell_based_surface_model, or etns_shell_based_wireframe_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of the two centroids.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_two_cartesian_points. The detected difference according to this criterion is calculated centroid for each element.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A different_curve_length is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the difference of the sums of the curve length is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_edge_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of the sums of the curve lengths.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_length_measure. The detected difference according to this criterion is the sum of the curve lengths of each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

attribute inherited from the entity

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A different_number_of_closed_shell is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .

logical test that tests if the number of
in two s are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_manifold_solid_brep.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if the number of s in two compared s are different.

type name of detected difference shall be ddns_count_measure. The detected difference according to this criterion is the number of
in each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A different_number_of_geometric_elements is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check if the number of any geometric elements in consideration in the two s or s are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be either etns_manifold_solid_brep or etns_shell_based_surface_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if the number of any geometric elements in consideration are different.

type name of detected difference shall be ddns_three_count_measure. The detected differences according to this criterion are number of , , and
in each
or .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A different_number_of_geometric_elements_wireframe_model is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check if the numbers of any geometric elements in consideration in the two s are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_shell_based_wireframe_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if the number of any geometric elements are different.

type name of detected difference shall be ddns_two_count_measure. The detected differences according to this criterion are number of
and
in each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A different_number_of_topological_elements is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check if the number of any topological elements in the two models, s or s, are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be either etns_manifold_solid_brep or etns_shell_based_surface_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if the number of any topological elements are different.

type name of detected difference shall be ddns_five_count_measure. The detected differences according to this criterion are number of , , ,
and in each
or .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A different_number_of_topological_elements_wireframe_model is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check if the number of any topological elements in the two s are different.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_shell_based_wireframe_model.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if the number of any topological elements are different.

type name of detected difference shall be ddns_four_count_measure. The detected differences according to this criterion are the number of , ,
and
( and ) in each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A different_surface_area is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the difference of surface areas are larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_area_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of surface areas.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_two_cartesian_points. The detected difference according to this criterion is the surface area of each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A different_surface_normal is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the difference of the unit normals is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.

type name of inspected value shall be mdns_plane_angle_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of the angle between two directions at the corresponding two points.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_cartesian_point or ddns_point_on_surface. The detected difference according to this criterion is calculated for each .

type name of accuracy shall be atns_length_measure. The accuracy is used to calculate the nearest point on a
from a discretized point.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

shall be and value of
attribute inherited from the entity
shall be 'discretization_distance_tolerance'.

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A different_volume is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the difference of the volumes are larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_manifold_solid_brep.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_volume_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the difference of two volumes.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_volume_measure. The detected difference according to this criterion is the volume of each .
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A mismatch_of_arcwise_connected_curves is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the distance of the two corrsponding points is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_edge_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_edge_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the distance between two corresponding points.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_cartesian_point or ddns_point_on_curve. The detected difference according to this criterion is calculated for each .

type name of accuracy shall be atns_length_measure. The accuracy is used to calculate the nearest point on a
from a discretized point.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

shall be and value of
attribute inherited from the entity

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A mismatch_of_arcwise_connected_surfaces is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the distance of the corresponding two points is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the distance between two corresponding points.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_cartesian_point or ddns_point_on_surface. The detected difference according to this criterion is calculated for each .

type name of accuracy shall be atns_length_measure. The accuracy is used to calculate the nearest point on a
from a discretized point.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A mismatch_of_arcwise_connected_surfaces_boundary is a type of
and
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the distance of the two corresponding points is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the distance between two corresponding points.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_cartesian_point or ddns_point_on_curve. The detected difference according to this criterion is calculated for boundary edges of each .

type name of accuracy shall be atns_length_measure. The accuracy is used to calculate the nearest point on a
from a discretized point.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A mismatch_of_edges is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s are mismatch_of or not.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_edge_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if mismatched edges between the compared model and the comparing model are detected.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_edge or ddns_several_edges.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A mismatch_of_faces is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s are mismatch_of or not.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if mismatched faces between the compared model and the comparing model are detected.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_face or ddns_several_faces.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A mismatch_of_point_cloud_and_related_geometry is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the distance of the two corresponding points is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be either etns_connected_edge_set or etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_point_cloud_dataset.

type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the distance between a point of the
and the nearest point on the
or .
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_cartesian_point, ddns_point_on_curve, or ddns_point_on_surface

type name of accuracy shall be atns_length_measure. The accuracy is used to calculate the nearest point on a
or
from a point of ..

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

A mismatch_of_points is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
numerical test to check if the distance of two s is larger than the threshold.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_vertex_point.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_vertex_point.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_length_measure. The inspected value according to this criterion shows the distance between two s.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_no_element. No detected difference according to this criterion is reported.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

The
of
by numerical test shall be of type .

A mismatch_of_underlying_edge_geometry is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s have different underlying geometry data types.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if different underlying geometry data type between corresponding s is detected.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_edge.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A mismatch_of_underlying_face_geometry is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s have different underlying geometry data types.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of the other comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if different underlying geometry data type between corresponding s is ditected.
type name of detected difference shall be ddns_face.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A missing_edge is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s are mismatch_of or not.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_edge_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if mismatched edges between the compared model and the comparing model are detected.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_no_element or ddns_edge.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.

A missing_face is a type of
that implements the ARM concept of .
logical test to check whether the two corresponding s are mismatch_of or not.
type name of the comparison target product data shall be etns_connected_face_set.
type name of inspected value shall be mdns_boolean_value. The inspected value according to this criterion is TRUE, if mismatched faces between the compared model and the comparing model are detected.
type name of detected difference shall be either ddns_no_element or ddns_face.
no accuracy shall be associated with this criterion.
